name: Trash Collection Combiner
description:
-Gameplay-

Use the WASD or ARROW keys to move your tank. You pick up the trash by driving into it with the red bumper. For each piece of trash you collect you get 3 points. If you click on the left panel or press SPACE a little guide to which items combined pops out. And shows you which combinations gives you bonus points, and which combinations gives you minus points. 

All the items you pick up gets stored in an invisible inventory. And when a combination is activated, the items used in that combination gets destroyed.

-Assets-

Assets used:

RPG Urban Pack https://kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack

Top Down Tanks Redux https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-tanks-redux

UI Pack: Space Expansion https://kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-space-expansion

Kenny Fonts https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

Generic Items https://kenney.nl/assets/generic-items

The only changes made to the assets is: Tint, transparency, and scale.
